title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: In Photon, when using the Java editor, there is no popup menu that appears when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This popup menu should allow users to add breakpoints, marks, and perform other related actions, but it does not.
EB: In Photon, when using the Java editor, the expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This popup menu should provide options to add breakpoints, marks, and perform other related actions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 
Expected result: A popup menu should appear, providing options to add breakpoints, marks, and perform other related actions.
